title: Serena Williams shares video of daughter Alexis Olympia in pink dress
text:
Besides Venus and Serena Williams there wasn't a more iconic duo until Serena' daughter Alexis Olympia came along.

On Monday evening, Serena, 38, shared a video of her two-year-old daughter trying to play with her mom at home.

The professional tennis player sat on the floor in her living room as Alexis was attempting to lead her somewhere before giving up and running away on her own.

Play time: On Monday evening, Serena shared a video of her daughter Alexis trying to play with her mom at home

Adorable: Her daughter, who she shares with her husband Alexis Ohanian, wore an adorable pink dress with a poofy tulle skirt and her hair up in a high pony tail

Her daughter, whom she shares with her husband Alexis Ohanian, wore an adorable pink dress with a poofy tulle skirt and her hair up in a high pony tail.

Alexis tried to grab her mother's hand to bring her along on her journey, but Serena seemed pretty comfortable sitting next to her couch.

The mother-of-one looked relaxed in a gray sweater and her long hair pulled back into a low ponytail as she relaxed with her family.

Having fun: Alexis tried to grab her mother's hand to bring her along on her journey, but Serena seemed pretty comfortable sitting next to her couch

Having fun! The professional tennis player sat on the floor in her living room as Alexis was trying to lead her somewhere before giving up and running away on her own

The 23 major singles titles champion gave birth back in January of 2017, but her delivery came with a few bumps in the road.

She had to be given an emergency cesarean section after her heart rate dropped.

But that wasn't the end of it, after the smooth delivery she noticed she was having difficulty breathing after recently going off of her blood thinner medication (something she takes to prevent blood clots) but noticed something was wrong.

'I told you, I need a CT scan and a heparin drip.' she said she told the doctors when they ignored her request for an IV and heparin. After following her requests, doctors discovered multiple small blood clots in her lungs.

But after an extended stay in the hospital after surgery for the lung clot and her c-section wound reopening she was finally able to return home with her new daughter.

Power couple: Serena and her husband Alexis Ohanian pose together at the Game Changers Screening in New York back in September

Serena and the Reddit co-founder mat back in 2015 at the Cavalieri Hotel in Rome. After a humorous encounter, Serena invited him to Paris to watch her play.

He made his first appearance on her Instagram just a little over a year later in September 2016 and got engaged just a couple months later that December at the exact table where they first met.

And in January of 2017 just one month after their engagement, Serena found out she was pregnant with their first child together and went on to win the Australian Open at just eight weeks pregnant.
description: Besides Venus and Serena Williams there wasn't a more iconic duo until Serena' daughter Alexis Olympia came along. On Monday evening, Serena shared a video of her daughter.
